## contacts.Api.get() method

Gets the contact associated to the specified contact id.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(contactId: string): Promise<Contact>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  contactId | string | the contact to retrieve. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Contact](./smokeball-client-sdk.contacts.contact.md)<!-- -->&gt;

the specified contact.

## Example


```
// Returns the contact with the specified contact id.
const contact = await sdk.contacts.get('e9b9084b-c9b4-4f3c-9f5a-4c83ed3ac265');
```
